mysterybox_shift_key_down: §aWhen the block is broken gives you a random selected mystery box choice.
questionmark_shift_key_not_down: §aWhat does this do? §aWhat does it go to? §aWhat does it craft? §aPress §6SHIFT §afor more info!
questionmark_shift_key_down: Used to craft the Mystery Box.
goodluck.message.four: §aThe Mystery Box has granted you boons.
